metadata.title: CVE-2023-2426 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Use of Out-of-range Pointer Offset in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.1499.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-2426` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.4
vim-athena - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.4
vim-common - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.4
vim-gtk3 - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.4
vim-gui-common - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.4
vim-motif - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.4
vim-nox - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.4
vim-runtime - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.4
vim-tiny - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.4
xxd - 2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

notes.note: rodrigo-zaiden> issue was likely introduced around versions 8.2.1665 (commit 635414dd) and 8.2.2813 (commit bb01a1ef), that is, affects Ubuntu versions starting from jammy. PoC easily reproduces on affected versions.

criterions.comment: vim package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:9.0.0242-1ubuntu1.4').
